message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_CORRECTION_IS_NOT_OPEN_IT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_CORRECTION_IS_NOT_OPEN_IT_CANNOT_BE_SUBMITFORAPPROVAL
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_CORRECTION_IS_NOT_OPEN_IT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_CORRECTION_IS_NOT_PENDINGAPPROVAL_IT_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Pending Approval', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_CORRECTION_IS_NOT_PENDINGAPPROVAL_IT_CANNOT_BE_DENIED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Pending Approval', it cannot be denied.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_ALREADY_CORRECTION_EXISTS_WITH_STATUS_OPEN
message.locale: There is already an 'Open' correction for this service invoice line item.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_SERVICEINVOICELINEITEM_IS_NOT_COMPLETE_CANNOT_BE_CORRECTED
message.locale: This service invoice line item is not 'Complete', it cannot be corrected.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_FV_CORRECTIONREASON_MUST_BE_ENTER
message.locale: Correction Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_FV_NUMBEROFUNITS_MUST_BE_ENTER
message.locale: Number Of Units must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_EXTERNALREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The External Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_SAREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Service Authorization Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n
The Service Authorisation Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_CASEREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Case Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_PROVIDERREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Provider Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_PROVIDERNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Provider Name, '%1s', entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_PAYEEREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Payee Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_PAYEENAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Payee Name, '%1s', entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_CLIENTREFNO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Client Reference Number, %1s, entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_CLIENTFIRSTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Client First Name, '%1s', entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_CLIENTLASTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Client Last Name, '%1s', entered is too long, maximum allowed is %2n

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_FV_REASON_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Correction reason must be less than or equal to %1n characters

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_SERVICEINVOICELINEITEM_DATA_NOT_CORRECTED
message.locale: The information on the correction is the same as the original service invoice line item

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_NUMBER_OF_UNITS_NOT_EQUAL_TO_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_OF_SERVICE_PERIOD
message.locale: The Number of Units, %1n, must be equal to the number of days of service provided, %2n, for a placement service.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_SILICORRECTION_IS_NOT_OPEN_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Open', the client cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_SILICORRECTION_IS_NOT_OPEN_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction is not 'Open', the client cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THIS_SILICORRECTION_MUST_HAVE_ATLEAST_ONE_CLIENT
message.locale: This service invoice line item correction must have at least one client.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_THE_CLIENT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The client already exists for this service invoice line item correction, the client cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SILICORRECTION_XRV_CLIENT_IS_NOT_AUTHORIZED
message.locale: The client, %1s, is not authorized.
The client, %1s, is not authorised.
